ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( (ISPICKVAL( Tour_Program_Approval__c, "Approved") && $Profile.Id='00e30000001yGyh'), !ISCHANGED( Architects_Meet_Actuals__c ), !ISCHANGED( Boarers_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Builders_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Dealers_Factory_Visit_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Dealers_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Dealers_Salesmen_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Engineers_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Exhibition_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Farmers_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Jeep_Campaign_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Mechanics_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Mini_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Plumbers_Meet_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Shandy_Show_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Tractor_Show_Actuals__c), !ISCHANGED( Plumber_MechanicEngineers_Factory_Visit__c) )
